com.facebook.litho.testing.shadows

Class LayoutDirectionViewGroupShadow

  • java.lang.Object
    • ShadowView
      • com.facebook.litho.testing.shadows.LayoutDirectionViewShadow
        • com.facebook.litho.testing.shadows.LayoutDirectionViewGroupShadow

  • public class LayoutDirectionViewGroupShadow
extends LayoutDirectionViewShadow
    Robolectric shadow view does not support layout direction so we must implement our custom shadow. We must have ViewGroup and View shadows as Robolectric forces us to have the whole hierarchy.
